body: Foreign Notes provides a loose translation - here and here - of the "30 reasons why it is difficult to believe today's authorities," which were published in the Feb. 11 issue of the Ukrainian weekly news magazine Korrespondent.

title: Ukraine: "Reasons For Not Believing Today's Authorities"
